metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0110 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In psi_write of psi.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to amissing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withno additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not neededfor exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-148159562References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
